NK103(pe)009:2: sarba d+har+m+aak+aa yadz+ny+aa nasan tima h+aab+ho d+higar+b+hash+aastran+aa ma /
NK103(pe)009:4: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos 'khor 'das thams cad rten
NK103(pe)009:5: byed pas sku dang kun gsal bas ye shes lnga
NK103(pe)009:6: dang lhag ma med pas rdzogs pa chen po 'bras
NK103(pe)009:7: bu byang chub kyibcud 'dus pas snying poskal ldan rnams
NK103(pe)009:8: la gsal bar bstan pa zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)009:9: bcom ldan 'das lhun gsum ma btsal bar chos kun
NK103(pe)009:10: yul med gsal mtshan nyid rang bzhin stong nyid cir
NK103(pe)009:11: yang 'gag pa med par lhun gyis grub pa rnams
NK103(pe)009:13: mtshan nyid dang sngags kyis rgyu 1dang rtsol ba la
NK103(pe)009:14: brtson pas dus phyi mar 'bras bu bskyed 1bsgrubs pas
NK103(pe)009:15: thob tu re ma thob tu dogs pa'i 'dod pa'i
NK103(pe)009:16: nad pa kun dga' snying po bdag /
NK103(pe)009:17: rang nyid la 'bras bu ye nas lhun gyis grub
NK103(pe)009:18: pa'i dpal dang ldan pas rgyu rkyen gyis ma bskyed
NK103(pe)009:19: rtsol bas ma bsgrubs par lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde
NK103(pe)009:20: ba chen po'i bdud rtsis gso bar mdzad pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:21: sman pa'i mchog nyid gyur pa ngo bo chos longs
NK103(pe)009:22: dang de dag gi sku gsum ka'i bcud dang ldan
NK103(pe)009:23: pa gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag sprul sku rdo rje
NK103(pe)009:24: 'chang dang // dam pa sku bzhi la bdun pa'i
NK103(pe)009:25: sgra la rtogs pa lta bas mos goms pa ting
NK103(pe)009:26: nge 'dzin gyis mthar phyin 'bras bu'i tshul gyis phyag
NK103(pe)009:28: bu'i dpal dang ye nas ldan pa de lhan skyes
NK103(pe)009:29: kyis ma mthong ba la phyin ci log tu brtags
NK103(pe)009:30: pas 'khrul pa'i shes pa rgyas te //
NK103(pe)009:31: las kyi rlung gis khams gsum du bskyod pas duhkhasa
NK103(pe)009:32: nyam thag pa'i nad de las mthar phyin par bya
NK103(pe)009:33: ba'i thabs // rgyu dang brtsol ba bzhi tshan gnyis
NK103(pe)009:34: te rtsol brgyad rang rang gi 'dod pa snang stong
NK103(pe)009:35: gnyis gnyis med kyi phyogs su bcad pas mu mtha'
NK103(pe)009:36: mnyam grol gyi dmar thag las //
NK103(pe)009:37: lhun gnas bde chen du ye nas gnas pas rgyu
NK103(pe)009:38: rkyen 'dus te byas pa'i 'bras bu grol bar bya
NK103(pe)009:39: ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying 1po 'bras bu gsal
NK103(pe)009:41: de 1yang bstan pa'i dgos ched dang rang gi ngo bo dang de'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid dang //
NK103(pe)009:42: sgro skur med par bstan pa nges tshig dang rnam
NK103(pe)009:43: pa'i grangs dang gnas pa'i dus dang bdun kyis lus
NK103(pe)009:45: 'bras bu'i che ba'i yon tan cig chog tu gdul bya la bstan pas na //
NK103(pe)009:46: de zhe la 'dod pa'i 'gro ba rnams de thob
NK103(pe)009:47: pa'i thabs lam la 'jug cing brtson par byed cing
NK103(pe)009:48: // sku dang ye shes rang la rang chas su
NK103(pe)009:49: ye nas ldan pas logs nas thob tu med par
NK103(pe)009:50: lhun gyis gnas par bstan pas //
NK103(pe)009:51: blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba chen po'i ngang du bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)009:52: lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde ba chen po rtogs nas de'i ngang du goms pas //
NK103(pe)009:53: gzhi'i nyes pa lhan skyes kyi ma rig pa dang
NK103(pe)009:54: zhor snang gis brtags pa rnam rang sar grol nas
NK103(pe)009:55: // lam gyi nyes pa rtsol ba'i nad dang bral te mthar son pa'i 'bras bu dang //
NK103(pe)009:56: theg pa brgyad rang rang gi zhe 'dod kyi 'bras
NK103(pe)009:57: bu la gnas pas gzhi las cher rgyas par 'dod
NK103(pe)009:58: pa'o // de yi rang bzhin ni rten sku chos longs sprul gsum //
NK103(pe)009:59: de'i dgongs pa ye shes stong me mnyam so bya lnga mngon shes stobs mi 'jigs pa la sogs //
NK103(pe)009:60: spros pa gcod pa'i thig le drug la che ba lngas //
NK103(pe)009:61: 'og ma pa las khyad par du 'phags pas na rdzogs pa chen po'o //
NK103(pe)009:62: de dag kun kyang rang rig pa'i ye shes nyid kyis //
NK103(pe)009:63: mtshan nyid rang mkhyen pas na rang bzhin stong rnam pa gsal des ni //
NK103(pe)009:64: yon tan kun gyi gzhi rten byed pas sku shes
NK103(pe)009:65: bya kun gsal bas ye shes mu matha'i spros pa
NK103(pe)009:67: theg pa gzhan dang mtshungs pa med pas che ba
NK103(pe)009:68: rnams ye nas gnas pas bde ba chen po'i mtshan
NK103(pe)009:69: nyid dang ldan par yongs su chod pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:70: don de ka nyid gdul bya skal ba dang ldan pa la //
NK103(pe)009:71: chos sku byin gyi rlabs 1longs sku rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan 1sprul sku tshangs pa'i 1gsung 111gsum gyis //
NK103(pe)009:72: nges par sgro skur dang bral bar tshig tu bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)009:73: mtshan nyid de la ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog pa dang the tshom dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)009:74: sku dang ye shes dang rdzogs pa chen po dang //
NK103(pe)009:75: rnam par gzhag pas 'bras bu byang chub kyi snying por gnas te //
NK103(pe)009:76: sku yod par 'dod pa dang med par 'dod pa dang yod med las 'das par 'dod pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:77: 'gro ba rigs drug las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus yod la //
NK103(pe)009:78: mu stegs log par lta ba'i gcer bu pa ni
NK103(pe)009:79: dbang phyug chen po gdugs dkar bzung ba'i dbyibs 'dra
NK103(pe)009:80: ba'i lus la // tshangs pa gdong bzhi pa dang
NK103(pe)009:81: khyab 'jug r+aa hu la dang lha chen po ma
NK103(pe)009:83: bye brag pa rdul phra rab las grub pa'i snying
NK103(pe)009:84: dkyil gyi bdag dri ma dang bral ba'i lus po
NK103(pe)009:85: // grangs can pa rnam 'gyur gtso bo la thim
NK103(pe)009:86: pas spyi gzugs bdag yan gar du gnas pas thar
NK103(pe)009:88: rig byed pa rig pa'i dngos po de yang rtag pa gcig pu bde ba //
NK103(pe)009:89: rang dbang can du gnas pa shes lta'i lus su 'dod //
NK103(pe)009:90: de dag kyang gzugs khams ris kyi lha yi bye brag 'ga' zhig dang //
NK103(pe)009:91: dngos su nam mkha' mtha' yas la sogs pa gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi la gnas //
NK103(pe)009:92: te mya ngan las 'das par 'dod kyang bdag 'dzin dang bcas pas 'jig rten pa dngos yin no //
NK103(pe)009:93: zhi ba phyogs gcig par mya ngan las 'das pa
NK103(pe)009:94: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pa lhag bcas rdul phra
NK103(pe)009:95: rab las grub pa'i lus can ni //
NK103(pe)009:96: sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang po sku rang bzhin tu byung ba'i cha lugs 'chang ba dang //
NK103(pe)009:97: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang cha lugs can lus
NK103(pe)009:98: kyi rdzu 'phrul stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu
NK103(pe)009:100: dbang po rnon po bse ru ltar gcig pu'am rtul po ne tso lta bur khyu ru gnas so //
NK103(pe)009:101: rgyur zhugs pa dang 'bras bur gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)009:102: skyes bu zung bzhi la gang zag ya brgyad de lus kyi rgyan dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)009:103: sar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma'i lus can ni //
NK103(pe)009:104: 'gro ba gang 'dul ba'i dus su ting nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul gyis //
NK103(pe)009:105: lus de blangs nas gdul bya de 'dul ba dang //
NK103(pe)009:106: mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa ni rang gi //
NK103(pe)009:107: las dang smon lam gyi dbang gis lus len la //
NK103(pe)009:108: rang gi lam sbyong zhing gzhan gyi don yang smon lam gyi nus pas byed do //
NK103(pe)009:109: theg pa thun mong ba sa bcu rgyun gyi tha
NK103(pe)009:110: ma bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi rjes thob kyi
NK103(pe)009:111: tshe // sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK103(pe)009:112: la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bu'i longs
NK103(pe)009:113: tshe // skus 'dul cing // mos pa spyod pa tshogs sbyor ba rnams la sprul pa'i sku //
NK103(pe)009:114: sgyu ma'i dpe rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzugs las /
NK103(pe)009:115: de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis ni /
NK103(pe)009:116: chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
NK103(pe)009:123: sprul pa dang mtshungs par mthong ngo //
NK103(pe)009:126: te de yang sku 1dang gsung 1thugs 1yon tan 1las /
NK103(pe)009:128: 1 / rnams gdul bya'i dbang gis bsam 1111gyis mi khyab par ston pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:129: mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe nam mkha'i ngang du cir yang mi rtog pa ste /
NK103(pe)009:131: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis ni chos
NK103(pe)009:132: thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par mthong ngo
NK103(pe)009:134: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' rtags gsang sngags phyi yi dbang thob pas //
NK103(pe)009:135: kri ya rdo rje 'dzin dang u pa ya rigs bzhir 'chang //
NK103(pe)009:136: yo ga stug po bkod pa'i gzhal yas na //
NK103(pe)009:137: 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bu'i lus su bsgyur ba'i lha'i 'khor lo can //
NK103(pe)009:138: kri ya sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //
NK103(pe)009:139: bya ba'i u pa ya yon tan dang ldan pa la byed pa po las kyi rigs kyis mdzad //
NK103(pe)009:140: pa de gnyis bsdus pas bzhi'am yang na yo ga de gnyis su phye bas rigs lnga po nyid //
NK103(pe)009:141: rgyan dang cha lugs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i tshul du gtso 'khor rdzogs par bzhed pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:142: rnal 'byor chen po gsang sngags nang gi rtags can ni //
NK103(pe)009:143: chos thams cad stong gsal dbyer med ni chos kyi sku dang kun tu 'od kyis la //
NK103(pe)009:144: kun la yul med du rol ba'i bde ba chen
NK103(pe)009:145: po ni longs spyod rdzogs sku dang pad+ma'i spyan 1gyis
NK103(pe)009:146: // de 1yi gzugs brnyan gdul bya la thugs rjes bslang nas //
NK103(pe)009:147: ye shes 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa ru gsal ba de'i sprul pa'i sku la //
NK103(pe)009:148: rtog tshogs zhe gnyis la sogs pa gnas 'gyur bas
NK103(pe)009:149: lha zhe gnyis la sogs par grangs nges pa can
NK103(pe)009:150: // phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing cho 'phrul bzhi rdzogs par bzhed do //
NK103(pe)009:151: a ti'i rjes su 'jug pa ni ye nas rdzogs pas lha'i grangs dang bral ba'i //
NK103(pe)009:152: gdal ba chos nyid kyi ngang du kun rdzogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:153: thugs rje mdzad pa ni gzugs skur rdzogs par rol bas //
NK103(pe)009:154: bde ba chen po'i rtsal rdzogs pas gzhan gyi don grub pa can no //
NK103(pe)009:155: lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde ba chen po kun la khyab pas bdal ba'i sku la //
NK103(pe)009:156: chos sku ni mu bzhi mtha' drug gi spros pa kun las ye nas grol ba yin la //
NK103(pe)009:157: kun mkhyen pa'i rang rig nyid 'khor 'das kyi bde
NK103(pe)009:158: ba kun la ma chags par longs spyod pas bde
NK103(pe)009:161: de'i 'od zer gdul bya la thugs rje'i rnam pa sna tshogs par 'phrul pa ni sprul sku //
NK103(pe)009:162: de gsum dbyer med par byang chub kyi sems kyi
NK103(pe)009:163: ngang du rdzogs te lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyu de
NK103(pe)009:164: las // ma la gnas dag pa'i rig 'dzin byang
NK103(pe)009:165: chub sems dpa' rgyud pas de'i bdag po'i rkyen byas
NK103(pe)009:166: las // nas // thun mong dang khyad par gyi
NK103(pe)009:167: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'i longs skus 'dul
NK103(pe)009:168: las // nas // bar mdzad // 'gro ba rigs
NK103(pe)009:169: drug gi rgyud dag pa lam gnyis thob pa dang
NK103(pe)009:170: ma dag pa phal pa'i ngo la //
NK103(pe)009:171: spyir gzugs sku 'char ba'i bdag rkyen gdul bya grol ba'i bdag rkyen du gzugs sku gsungs so //
NK103(pe)009:172: bdag po'i rkyen de nyid kyis byas nas dag pa'i sprul sku thub drug dang //
NK103(pe)009:173: ma dag pa sprul pa'i sku rgya chen por shar //
NK103(pe)009:174: te mdzad pa sku gsung thugs /
NK103(pe)009:175: bsam gyis mi khyab pas gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul bar mdzad do //
NK103(pe)009:178: res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de /
NK103(pe)009:179: ri dang skye bo thams cad do //
NK103(pe)009:180: zhes spyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par rgyud las grags so //
NK103(pe)009:181: gzugs sku de dag gi ngo bo nyid ni dngos pa'i mtshan ma ru grub pa'i sku las 'das /
NK103(pe)009:182: 1 /'khor 'das kyi chos kun gyi ye nas gnas
NK103(pe)009:183: pa'i gzhi rtsa ba bcu 'dus pa'i snying po ngo
NK103(pe)009:185: rang rig bde chen longs sku nges med chos sku
NK103(pe)009:186: nyi 'od sprul sku ste de gsum du shar bas
NK103(pe)009:187: // rang byung gi ye shes mchog gi sku lhun gyis grub pas med pa las 'das pas //
NK103(pe)009:188: yod par gsungs pa'ang yod 1pa dang med 1pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:189: nam mkha' rnam shes cung zad med pa yod min
NK103(pe)009:190: med min gyi skye mched bzhi na tshor ba 'du
NK103(pe)009:191: shes 'du byed rnam shes dang ming bzhi'i phung po
NK103(pe)009:192: tsam las // lag pas gzugs shing gnyen pos gzhom
NK103(pe)009:193: du rung pa'i 'byung ba las grub pa'i lus med
NK103(pe)009:194: tsam las // la // srid pa bar ma do dang dri za'i grong khyer dang //
NK103(pe)009:195: yi dwags dang lha srin 'ga' la yang de lta bu'o //
NK103(pe)009:196: mu stegs chad par lta ba'i 'dod pas lus 'di dang bral ba dang rgyun chad par 'dod //
NK103(pe)009:197: rig pa'i ngang tshul mi brtan par 'dod pa ni ngan 'gror ltung ba'i gnas //
NK103(pe)009:198: phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa nyan thos mdo sde pas nyon mongs pa zhi bas //
NK103(pe)009:199: shing zad pas me shi ba ji lta bar //
NK103(pe)009:200: dge slong lhag med du mya ngan las 'das pa la //
NK103(pe)009:201: lus ni med la gzung ba sdug bsngal dang 'dzin pa skad cig ma phra ba tsam yod pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:202: mtshan nyid la ldem pa ni rang bzhin la dgongs
NK103(pe)009:203: pa ste spros bral du gsungs pa la mi 'gyur
NK103(pe)009:204: ba // spros pa thams cad dang bral 1ba kho na la gshis kyi ngang tshul du bltas nas //
NK103(pe)009:205: der 1grol ba ni mthar thug pa chos sku'i sar 'dod cing //
NK103(pe)009:206: lam sa'i smon lam gyis don bya bar 'dod pas 'gro ba'i don grub pa'ang //
NK103(pe)009:207: sangs rgyas sku ru mi blta sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos lung bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK103(pe)009:208: sangs rgyas gzugs su mi blta mtshan dang ni //
NK103(pe)009:209: rigs dang rgyud du mi rtag sgra dang ni //
NK103(pe)009:210: chad par gyur pa ma yin sems dang ni //
NK103(pe)009:211: rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ba yin //
NK103(pe)009:212: chos nyid gang yin de ni bcom ldan 'das //
NK103(pe)009:213: zhes pa nyid kyis dgrol lo //
NK103(pe)009:215: rgyud mi brtag sgra dang ni chad par 'gyur ba
NK103(pe)009:216: ma yin sems dang ni rnam shes yid kyis ye
NK103(pe)009:217: shes nyid phye ba ma yin pa sde de dag
NK103(pe)009:219: ye shes yod pa'ang de rnams la dgongs te yod par bstan pa las 'dra ste //
NK103(pe)009:220: rig byed pa bems po las log pa rig pa'i
NK103(pe)009:221: stong pa las dngos po mi rtag pa las rtag
NK103(pe)009:222: pa du ma las gcig pu duhkha las bde ba
NK103(pe)009:223: // thams cad bdag tu thim pas ye shes mu
NK103(pe)009:224: mtha' yas par bu ga rnams nam mkha' chen por
NK103(pe)009:226: chos kyi dbyings spros bral gyi rgyan dang bral bas rtag dngos kyi mtha' ru lhung ste //
NK103(pe)009:227: rang bzhin spros bral dang rnam pa sgyu ma'i dmar thag las te thag ma chod pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:228: gcer bu mthun snang gi chos gcig chos kun gyi dngos gzhi can //
NK103(pe)009:229: snang ba yul dang myong zhing rig pa'i shes pa sbrags pa yis //
NK103(pe)009:230: ye shes na dper na tshon lnga bsres pa'i kha
NK103(pe)009:231: dog gi phug ske'am nor bu gzi'i rnam pa lta
NK103(pe)009:232: bu 'dod de // chos thams cad ma 'dres pa dang stong nyid kyi dmar thag las sa'o //
NK103(pe)009:233: bye brag pa snying dkyil gyi bdag rdul las grub
NK103(pe)009:234: pa'i yid kyis phyi nang gi chos thams cad gsal
NK103(pe)009:235: // bar 'dod pa de yang stong pa nyid kyi dmar thag las //
NK103(pe)009:236: grangs can pa'i skyes bu shes rig sems pa dug gsum rtag pas dri ma can //
NK103(pe)009:237: yon tan gsum gyi rang bzhin dang gtso bos sprul
NK103(pe)009:238: pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams zhen pas yul du brtags pa
NK103(pe)009:240: rjes su mthun la kun brtags kyi shes pa'i yul nyid can yin no //
NK103(pe)009:241: de dag kun kyang rtag pa'i dngos po'i mtshan ma la zhen pa'i blo can no //
NK103(pe)009:242: lung gi phyogs tsam la brten pa'i thams cad ci yang ma yin par 'dod pa'i shes pa yang //
NK103(pe)009:243: kun tu brtags pa'i yul tsam ste ye shes min pas //
NK103(pe)009:244: shes bya kun mkhyen pa dang don byed pa'i thugs rje'i dmar thag las sa'o //
NK103(pe)009:245: yo ga las 'das pa byis pa nyan thos pas gzung ba'i yul //
NK103(pe)009:246: rdul phra rab 'dzin par byed pa'i ye shes skad cig ma khas blangs //
NK103(pe)009:247: rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug gi rgyan dang
NK103(pe)009:248: ldan pas 'og nas gong du 'phar bar nus kyang
NK103(pe)009:249: // gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i bde ba chen po'i kun mkhyen gyi dmar thag las so //
NK103(pe)009:250: rang rgyal rkyen rtogs gzung ba'i yul rten 'brel tsam las ma grub par //
NK103(pe)009:251: 'dzin pas shes pa 'dod pa nyan thos de ji lta ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)009:252: rnal 'byor spyod pa pas gzung 'dzin de de dang bral ba'i //
NK103(pe)009:253: rang rig skad cig ma'i dngos por shes pas gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa //
NK103(pe)009:254: de'ang rang bzhin spros bral gyi rgya yis 'debs pa dang bral bas dmar thag las so //
NK103(pe)009:255: dbu ma mtha' dbus 'byed pas don dam par //
NK103(pe)009:256: yang dag par spros pa'i mtha' cis kyang dben pa ste //
NK103(pe)009:257: shes bya spros de shes par byed pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes de ni //
NK103(pe)009:258: kun rdzob tsam du gnas par 'dod mod kyang //
NK103(pe)009:259: des don la bsgribs shing bardzabasa pa yin na shes par mi rigs pas //
NK103(pe)009:260: don la ye shes dang thugs rje'i dmar thag las //
NK103(pe)009:261: dbu ma rgyun chad pa la las shes 1bya'i zag
NK103(pe)009:262: pa thams cad gnyen po rdo rje lta bus spangs
NK103(pe)009:264: de 1shes pa'i ye shes kyang zad par 'gyur te dper na shing zad pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:265: me 'chi ba ltar stong pa nyid kyi dbyings su mya ngan las 'das nas //
NK103(pe)009:266: lam dus kyi smon lam btab pa las grub cing
NK103(pe)009:267: gdul bya'i ngo la 'byung ba'i gzugs sku gnyis kyis
NK103(pe)009:268: // gdul bya'i don byed par 'dod pas dngos su chad lta stong pa yin te //
NK103(pe)009:269: de ltar shes pa'i rig pa de 'khrul lam ma 'khrul 'khrul pa yin na //
NK103(pe)009:270: 'o na shes bya stong pa de yang blo 'khrul pa la snang bas brdzun pa yin mod //
NK103(pe)009:271: yang na blo rig pa de ma 'khrul bar nges
NK103(pe)009:272: pa'i don nyid du bden par gnas pa yin na
NK103(pe)009:273: // 'o na shes pa bden pa de rgyun chad par ga la rigs te mi rigs so //
NK103(pe)009:274: nges par bden kyang rgyun chad pa yin na yang rgyun chad par 'gyur stong pa ste //
NK103(pe)009:275: de yang chad par 'dod na stong pa rgyun chad
NK103(pe)009:276: pa'i phyir snang bar gtan tshigs cis mi 'thad de
NK103(pe)009:278: nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu dang gsum skur pa 'debs pa las //
NK103(pe)009:279: don la gang bar gyur pa gang yod de med do //
NK103(pe)009:280: nges pa'i don du gzhi ci yang med pa las //
NK103(pe)009:281: snang ba yul dang myong ba rig pa 'char ba yin na rgyu mtshan des na //
NK103(pe)009:282: nam mkha' las kyang me tog cis mi skye ste skye bar rigs so //
NK103(pe)009:283: ye shes med par 'dod pa'i mu'ang de tsam mo //
NK103(pe)009:284: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang cir yang 'char ba rnam pa'i dmar thag las so //
NK103(pe)009:285: sngags phyi pas shing sna tshogs gi me dpung rang
NK103(pe)009:286: bzhin gcig kyang rang re'i me dpung tha dad pa
NK103(pe)009:287: ltar du // ta th+aa'i dgongs pa rang bzhin dbyer med kyi ngo bo nyid //
NK103(pe)009:288: shes bya kun mkhyen la rgyud tha dad du bzhugs par 'dod pa de //
NK103(pe)009:289: phan tshun gcig gis gcig mkhyen nam mi mkhyen mi
NK103(pe)009:290: mkhyen na rnam pa kun mkhyen par 'dod pa'i dam
NK103(pe)009:291: bca' bud bral // phan tshun mkhyen pas na gzung
NK103(pe)009:292: ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin mod
NK103(pe)009:293: bca' bud bral // // mtshan nyid rang rig dang rang bzhin spros bral dmar thag las //
NK103(pe)009:294: sngags nang pa ma h+aas stong gsal zung du 'jug tu mkhyen la //
NK103(pe)009:295: de las grol ba a nu yul sems 'du 'bral med pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:296: byang chub kyi sems chos nyid bde ba chen por gdal ba mkhyen //
NK103(pe)009:297: snang ba dang stong pa dang bden pa gnyis su 'dod pa las //
NK103(pe)009:298: grol la lta ba bden pa dbyer med kyi mthar thug pa ste //
NK103(pe)009:299: phyogs ris med pa'i bde chen gyi dmar thag las so //
NK103(pe)009:300: shin tu rnal mar 'byor pa a ti'i ye shes la //
NK103(pe)009:301: mu bzhi mtha' drug gi sel med gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni //
NK103(pe)009:302: spros pa kun dang bral ba de mkhyen pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:303: ye shes mtshan nyid rig par gsal ba'i /
NK103(pe)009:304: de'i 'od dam rnam pa cir yang shar //
NK103(pe)009:305: bas ma 'dres la de dag dbyer med pas yongs
NK103(pe)009:306: su rdzogs pa la mtha' drug po kun kadang bral
NK103(pe)009:307: ba la ji yang ma spangs pa ste //
NK103(pe)009:308: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mu mtha' cis kyang stong pas yod pa dngos po'i mtha' las 'das //
NK103(pe)009:309: de mkhyen pa'i ye shes la chos thams cad rdzogs pas med pa stong pa'i mtha' las 'das //
NK103(pe)009:310: de gnyis mtshan nyid tha dad dang bral bas bden pa gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das //
NK103(pe)009:311: gnyis med kyi ngos gzung dang bral bar rol pas gnyis med der 'dzin pa'i ngang las 'das //
NK103(pe)009:312: mu bzhi kun dang bral bas lhun grub ji yang ma spangs pas ka dag /
NK103(pe)009:313: kun mkhyen pa dang stong nyid kyi mtha' las 'das pa'ang rjogs //
NK103(pe)009:314: pas ye shes yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' thams cad las 'das par bzhugs so //
NK103(pe)009:315: mtshan nyid rang rig shes bya kun mkhyen gsal bas ye shes lhag chad med par rdzogs la //
NK103(pe)009:316: mu bzhi mtha' drug gi rang bzhin spros pa kun dang bral bas chos kyi dbyings lhag chad med //
NK103(pe)009:317: rang gi ngo bo ma 'dres pas bden gnyis lhag chad med //
NK103(pe)009:318: rang bzhin dbyer med du yongs su rdzogs pas bden gnyis ngo bos mnyam pa nyid lhag chad med //
NK103(pe)009:319: mu bzhi thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i rol pa'ang lhag chad med //
NK103(pe)009:320: phyogs gcig tu rgya ma chad pas ka dag lhag chad med par rdzogs //
NK103(pe)009:321: tshul de ltar du mkhyen la ngos med nyid rol par shar ba rnams //
NK103(pe)009:322: ma bcos par lhun gyis gnas pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po yin no //
NK103(pe)009:323: lhag ma med par rdzogs pa chen po yin //
NK103(pe)009:324: rang grol ba'i man ngag rgyas btab pa'i phyag rgya
NK103(pe)009:325: spros pa bcad pa'i thig le khyad par du 'phags
NK103(pe)009:326: pa'i che ba'o // sgo lngas yul lnga la mtshan
NK103(pe)009:327: mar rtog 1pa dang nyon yid ngar 'dzin pa can
NK103(pe)009:328: pa'i che ba'o // 2dang // yid snga phyi'i rjes
NK103(pe)009:329: su ming la spros par 'brang bar 3gzhi don gyi
NK103(pe)009:330: pa'i che ba'o // 2dang // kun gzhi bslad //
NK103(pe)009:331: de nyid sprul par 'i sku'i rol par shar bas
NK103(pe)009:332: mtshan nyid de mkhyen 2pa'i rang rig pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:333: ye shes kyis chos kun la bde bar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
NK103(pe)009:334: yid spros de nyid rnam 3par dag pa dmigs med chos kyi skur grol //
NK103(pe)009:335: de ltar sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i kun bzang thig le nyag gcig po'i ngang du //
NK103(pe)009:336: so so skye bo ltar rang rtog gis ma bslad
NK103(pe)009:337: nyid rkyen gyis mu stegs ltar ma bcos gnyen pos
NK103(pe)009:338: nyan thos ltar ma spangs rgyu nas rang rgyal ltar
NK103(pe)009:339: ma bkag cing // chos nyid du byang sems ltar
NK103(pe)009:340: ma sbyangs lha ru phyi pa ltar ma bsgyur rtsol
NK103(pe)009:341: bas ma h+aa ltar ma btsal rgyu yis a nu
NK103(pe)009:342: ltar ma bskyed par rang shes pa gsum lhun gsum
NK103(pe)009:343: ma bkag cing // du grol lo // de yang
NK103(pe)009:344: dgos ched gzhan sel don gnyer gnyis kyi phyir brdar
NK103(pe)009:345: ma bkag cing // du grol lo // btags kyi
NK103(pe)009:346: // yang na gshis ye shes yin pa min pa
NK103(pe)009:347: thig le nyag gcig la mu bzhi mtha' drug tu
NK103(pe)009:348: gsungs pa yin pa la lhun grub zhen log rtsol
NK103(pe)009:350: la la log gsum phyogs gcig tu 'dzin pa gol
NK103(pe)009:351: la de las gzhan pa'i don la zhen drug bsgribs
NK103(pe)009:353: pa la de dag dgos pas tha snyad du brtags
NK103(pe)009:354: pa tsam ste zhe 'dod dang bral ba'i ngang du
NK103(pe)009:355: rgyas gdab bo // de yang thig les spros pa bcad pa de //
NK103(pe)009:356: chos nyid rang gi 1mtshan kanyid rnam par dkar bas
NK103(pe)009:357: ltung khaba 1las rigs ga pas 1bden pa'i don ngo
NK103(pe)009:358: bo yis // khyad 1par 11 11'dzin pas na chos rnams bzhi po de yi gnas lugs ni //
NK103(pe)009:359: mtshan nyid rang gsal rnam pa lhun grub rang bzhin ngos med las mi 'da' bas //
NK103(pe)009:360: des mtshon pa dngos po'i rkyen du chos nyid ces bya ste //
NK103(pe)009:361: des na mtshan kama 1 ru rgyu kha'bras 1gnas gaskabs kyi rigs pa bden par //
NK103(pe)009:362: ngo bo chos ngacan dang khyad par gyi chos kyi 1'dod 1111pa'i spros pa gcod pas thig le //
NK103(pe)009:363: chos bzhi po rang re'i rang bzhin lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)009:364: las gzhan du mi 'gyur bas spros pa ye nas
NK103(pe)009:365: med // chos bzhi po de dag dor ba min
NK103(pe)009:366: kyi ngang tshul lhun grub gsum po de lta bur
NK103(pe)009:367: med // gnas pa'o // de ltar chos thams cad
NK103(pe)009:368: kyi ngang tshul rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid de
NK103(pe)009:369: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang //
NK103(pe)009:370: bstan pa rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas dang gzhir gnas shing rdzogs 0pas //
NK103(pe)009:371: chad pa nyid tshe ba'i spros pa'ang 'das 0pa yin ste //
NK103(pe)009:372: chos nyid dbyings kyi thig le rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:373: kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de tshe nyid
NK103(pe)009:374: na 'byung pa dang 'byung tshul dang 'byung ba po'i
NK103(pe)009:375: // dbyings kyi phyogs ris dang kun brtags thams cad rnam par rang bzhin gyis dag pas //
NK103(pe)009:376: dbyings zhes chad stong gi spros pa gcod pa'i dgos
NK103(pe)009:377: pas tha snyad du btags kyis ye nas rnam par
NK103(pe)009:378: dag pas // spros pa'i cog thams cad kyang rnam par bcad pa'i ngang yin pas thig le'o //
NK103(pe)009:379: gshis de dag mkhyen pa ni rang rig pa'i rang 'od rang gsal ba'i ye shes yin pas //
NK103(pe)009:380: nyan spang rang dgag byang sbyong sngags rtsol ba'i spros
NK103(pe)009:381: pa thams cad ye 1nas gsal bar rang grol 4bas
NK103(pe)009:382: // gshis la phyogs ris med par mkhyen 2pas rtsol brgyad las khyad par du gyur pa can du //
NK103(pe)009:383: rang shar ba ni 1ye 2shes 1chen 3po'i thig 4le yin no //
NK103(pe)009:384: de la phyogs ris med pas dgag sgrub dang blang dor bral bas //
NK103(pe)009:385: chos thams cad ye nas byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po yin pas //
NK103(pe)009:386: yod pa dngos por 1med pa stong par 1kun yin
NK103(pe)009:387: par 1gang yang min par 1'dod 1111pa'i spros pa thams
NK103(pe)009:388: cad bcad pas // bde ba chen por thams cad
NK103(pe)009:389: shong bas yangs pa chen po de ka kun po'i
NK103(pe)009:390: cad bcad pas // thig 1le'o // de 1yi rol
NK103(pe)009:391: pa'i rgyan du thams cad rdzogs te sgyu ma ltar
NK103(pe)009:392: cad bcad pas // thig 1le'o // du // yul
NK103(pe)009:393: gyi rnam pa kun de'i rol par lhun gyis grub
NK103(pe)009:394: pas rigs kyi khyad par du ma rang shar ba
NK103(pe)009:395: cad bcad pas // thig 1le'o // du // las
NK103(pe)009:396: // spong nyan 'gegs rang sbyong byang sgyu phyi rtsol
NK103(pe)009:398: lhun 0gyis gnas pa'i bde ba chen por rdzogs pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub pa'i thig le'o //
NK103(pe)009:399: ma bcos pa chos nyid kyi thig le las bstan
NK103(pe)009:400: pa rgya mtsho'i yon tan mtha' dag gi 'byung gnas
NK103(pe)009:401: su dbyings kyi thig ler rdzogs //
NK103(pe)009:402: pa las shar tshad kyi yon tan rnams dgos pa'i don dang bcas te ye nas rnam par dag /
NK103(pe)009:403: pas dbyings rnam dag thig le de nyid mkhyen pa'i
NK103(pe)009:404: rang gsal ba'i ye shes chen po de la phyogs
NK103(pe)009:405: ris dang dgag sgrub grol nas kun po'i thig le
NK103(pe)009:406: // che ba'i yon tan ma btsal gdod nas rdzogs
NK103(pe)009:407: pas lhun gyis grub pa'i thig le ste thig le
NK103(pe)009:408: drug bla dwags su btags pa yin no //
NK103(pe)009:409: chos kyi dbyings rnam dag gsum gyis shes bya'i gshis
NK103(pe)009:410: bstan ye shes chen po'i thig le gcig gis rang
NK103(pe)009:412: kun po dang lhun grub gnyis kyis ye shes dang
NK103(pe)009:413: gshis kyi yon tan khyad par dam pa bstan pa'o
NK103(pe)009:414: // thig le de las che ba lngas khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa ste //
NK103(pe)009:415: gang che na rdzogs chen rang gzhung mngon sum par sangs rgyas pas che //
NK103(pe)009:416: spong nyan gang las rang 'gegs sbyang byang ba las
NK103(pe)009:417: ches tshogs brgyad gang gis yul dang bcas pa nyid
NK103(pe)009:418: // mtshan nyid rang rig rang bzhin spros bral rnam
NK103(pe)009:419: pa sgyu mar mngon sum du lhun gyis grub pas
NK103(pe)009:420: // che // ji ltar de ltar rtogs pa la
NK103(pe)009:421: gnas pas bag chags thams cad kyi rten kun gzhi
NK103(pe)009:422: grol bas dngos po mtshan ma dang //
NK103(pe)009:423: ma rig pa'i mun pa sangsa te ye shes phyogs ris med par rgyas pas //
NK103(pe)009:424: dman pa'i theg pa mtshan nyid sde gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gnyen po yin pas che //
NK103(pe)009:425: rnal 'byor gang las che chen po la sogs rtsol sgrub kyi //
NK103(pe)009:426: gzhan dbang la ltos nas 'bras bu thob par 'dod
NK103(pe)009:427: pa de zil gyis gnon pa'i gnyen por yang che'o
NK103(pe)009:428: // bdag gang gis che nyid chen po rang nyid ye nas dbang thob zin pas che //
NK103(pe)009:429: 'og ma'i tshul ji ltar ngan pa'i rtsol ba sangs
NK103(pe)009:430: nas rang rig pa'i ye shes phyogs med du rgyas
NK103(pe)009:431: pas // gang las rjes su 'jug pa a nu
NK103(pe)009:432: la sogs pa rgyu 'bras su 'dod pa'i gnyen por
NK103(pe)009:433: pas // yang che'o // rgyu gang gis rkyen 'bras
NK103(pe)009:434: bu thams cad chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas
NK103(pe)009:435: pas // yang che'o // // rgyus ma ji ltar
NK103(pe)009:436: bskyed rang gi ngo bos cir yang mi gnas gnyen
NK103(pe)009:437: pos 'gag pa min pa de ltar 'dod pa de
NK103(pe)009:438: pas // yang che'o // // sangs la // kun
NK103(pe)009:439: mkhyen rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan ma zil gyis gnon pa'i
NK103(pe)009:441: sems dpa'i gang las rnal 'byor yo ga la sogs te blang dor can du 'dod pa //
NK103(pe)009:442: de zil gyis gnon pa'i gnyen por che blang bya
NK103(pe)009:443: dor bya thams cad de chos nyid gang gis yin
NK103(pe)009:444: pas che // gang ltar yin pa blang bya dang
NK103(pe)009:445: min pa dor bya'i phyogs ris thams cad sangsa la
NK103(pe)009:446: mnyam nyid rang gsal du rgyas pas che'o //
NK103(pe)009:447: lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde ba chen po'i don dam pa'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags te //
NK103(pe)009:448: phyogs gsum rtsol rgyu 'bras blang dor la bzlas pa'i rang gsal du ye nas sangs rgyas pa la //
NK103(pe)009:449: gzhan sel sangs rgyas dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dod
NK103(pe)009:450: pa dang nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'dod pa las
NK103(pe)009:451: grol zhing // don gnyen 'bras bu'i don de kho
NK103(pe)009:452: na nyid la rmongs la mtshon pa'i dgos pa yod
NK103(pe)009:453: pa'i phyir brda don sprad pa yin kyi //
NK103(pe)009:454: de yang tshig tu btags pa tsam la nges pa'i
NK103(pe)009:455: don du 'dod pa de zil gyis gnon pa'i gnyen
NK103(pe)009:456: por che'o // mngon sum snang ba tshogs brgyad yul
NK103(pe)009:457: dang bcas pa'i rang 1bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa
NK103(pe)009:458: por che'o // yin te // de 1yi mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)009:459: chos kyi dbyings mu mtha' thams cad las grol bas
NK103(pe)009:460: por che'o // yin te // sa su la //
NK103(pe)009:461: de mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med par
NK103(pe)009:462: kun la khyab pas rgyas pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:463: mngon sum snang ba'i chos de nyid sangs rgyas de yin de mtshon pa'i nges pa'i tshig /
NK103(pe)009:464: de yang dgos pas brda sprad pa yin kyi sgra tsam la don du blo mi gzhag go //
NK103(pe)009:465: mngon sum dang pos shes bya'i rang bzhin bstan /
NK103(pe)009:466: bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings gnyis mtshan nyid bstan //
NK103(pe)009:467: gcig thams cad de yin gis nges tshig tha ma med pas rgyas btab pa //
NK103(pe)009:468: che ba lngas khyad par 'phags pa des na rdzogs pa che'o //
NK103(pe)009:469: 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pas phyogs su zhen pa'i blo'i kho thag gcad pa ni //
NK103(pe)009:470: sku dang ye shes kyi bzhugs tshul dang rnam par
NK103(pe)009:471: rtog pa spangs sam ldan dang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa
NK103(pe)009:472: la gcig gam tha dad dang //
NK103(pe)009:473: shes bya mkhyen pa'i tshul dang don mdzad pa'i tshul
NK103(pe)009:474: dang bsgrub bya'i don gyis rang la gnas par dmar
NK103(pe)009:475: thag gcad pa'o // chos longs sprul sku gsum lhun
NK103(pe)009:476: gyis grub pa'i bde ba chen po ngos gzung dang
NK103(pe)009:477: phyogs ris las grol ba nyid //
NK103(pe)009:478: ye nas chos kun gyi ngo bo nyid du gnas shing rten byed pas sku'ang de bzhin pa ni //
NK103(pe)009:479: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te de nyid ji lta bar yul med par //
NK103(pe)009:480: mngon sum du gsal bar mdzad pas me long lta bu'i ye shes te de nyid //
NK103(pe)009:481: chos sku yin la de yis 'khor 'das kyi chos kun rang rig bde chen du //
NK103(pe)009:482: so sor rtog pas ma 'dres 1mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK103(pe)009:483: ye shes kyis mnyam 1par 11mnga' mdzad ba ni nyid
NK103(pe)009:485: sa la gnas pa'i sems dpa' dag gi ngo la
NK103(pe)009:486: 'khor lor sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar snang nas don
NK103(pe)009:487: mdzad pa ni gzhan longs sku'o //
NK103(pe)009:488: de yi byin rlabs 'bad rtsol med par gdul bya'i bya ba kun sgrub pas //
NK103(pe)009:489: thugs rje'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes te de nyid
NK103(pe)009:490: sprul pa gdul bya la ji ltar 'dod dgu'i skur
NK103(pe)009:491: shar ba'o // sku gsum ye shes lnga po de
NK103(pe)009:492: mtshon tshul nas ma 'dres kyang ngo bo dbyer med
NK103(pe)009:493: du yongs su rdzogs pas lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde
NK103(pe)009:495: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ye nas gnas pa mngon
NK103(pe)009:496: du mdzad pa'i ye shes rang shar ba ni chos
NK103(pe)009:498: de 1yi 'od shar longs sku rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang sprul pa'i skur bcas pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:499: gdul bya zhen chags can gyi ngo la lha mo
NK103(pe)009:500: dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyi bdag por shar ba
NK103(pe)009:501: de yang // yul zhen chags can gyis shar ba
NK103(pe)009:502: yin gyi nges pa'i don la bde ba nyams su
NK103(pe)009:503: myong ba'i tshor bas bsdus pas 'khrul pa la //
NK103(pe)009:504: zhi khro la sogs pa sku dang gnas phyogs ris
NK103(pe)009:505: su chad par snang ba'ang nges don du brtags pa'i
NK103(pe)009:507: gis snang ba yin pas 'khrul pa'i dbang gis snang bas sbyor don gyi kun gzhir zad la //
NK103(pe)009:508: gdul bya'i bag chags kyi snang ba sad pas sangs rgyas mthong tshad la //
NK103(pe)009:509: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de ltar du nges pa'i don du gnas par blos brtag pa min no //
NK103(pe)009:510: bstan pa la 'jug pa'i gang zag gi blo don
NK103(pe)009:511: ma drang ba'i phyir gzhi gnas lugs dang lam dang
NK103(pe)009:513: 'bras bur brdar btags nas bstan pas gzhan nas thog tu re ba'i blo thag bcad par zad do //
NK103(pe)009:514: yul gyi rnam pa la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i shes rig gi chos //
NK103(pe)009:515: ci skyes pa thams cad ye nas rang bzhin lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde ba chen po yin pas //
NK103(pe)009:516: 'khrul pa 0de spangs na lhun gnas de 0yang gnas pa min te de gnyis don mtshungs pas //
NK103(pe)009:517: log par rtog pa'i blos brtags pa rnams ye nas
NK103(pe)009:518: rang dag ste des na 'khrul pa dang ldan pa
NK103(pe)009:519: yang min // des na 'khrul pa logs su spang
NK103(pe)009:520: du med pas lhun gnas gyi bde ba chen po
NK103(pe)009:521: yang min // yin te // ngos gzung dang bral bas 'khrul pa ka nas rnam par dag pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:522: don gyi gnas lugs ni dngos por grub pa min pa'i phyir gcig dang du mar grub pa min //
NK103(pe)009:523: sems can 'khrul pa'i rig pa gcig dang du mar
NK103(pe)009:524: snang ba'ang de ltar gcig dang du ma'i mthar bden
NK103(pe)009:525: par mi gnas // rgyal khaba'i dgongs pa ni des
NK103(pe)009:526: kana gcig dang du ma kun dang bral bar mkhyen
NK103(pe)009:527: par mi gnas // no // de 1ltar min na
NK103(pe)009:528: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dngos por lta ba'i mthar nges
NK103(pe)009:529: par 'gyur te de cis zhe na //
NK103(pe)009:530: khyab byed gcig dang du ma dang 'brel bas khyab bya dngos po'i mthar 'gyur ba'am //
NK103(pe)009:531: de ltar 'brel pa min na mkhyen par 'thad pa min te mig shes kyis sgra bzhin no //
NK103(pe)009:532: des na mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya kun la khyab par gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)009:533: yul tha dad gyis yul can gcig dang du ma tha dad du gyur pa ga la rigs so //
NK103(pe)009:534: rig pa rang gsal rang byung gi ye shes 'khrul
NK103(pe)009:535: pa rnam par dag pa'i bde ba chen po des
NK103(pe)009:536: // yul gyi rnam pa ye nas rang gsal yul
NK103(pe)009:537: du grub pa min te thams cad yul med rang
NK103(pe)009:539: nyid kyi dgongs pa las gzhan du snang ba med
NK103(pe)009:540: de rang rig par cir yang shar ba rnams gsal
NK103(pe)009:541: lo // rang snang bder gshegs kyi dgongs pa la
NK103(pe)009:542: gdod nas tha ma'i phyogs ris su thugs rje rgya
NK103(pe)009:543: lo // ma chad pas // thugs rjes bzung par
NK103(pe)009:544: bya ba'i yul gdul bya dang smon lam btab pas
NK103(pe)009:545: lo // ma chad pas // 'brel lo // ched
NK103(pe)009:546: du ma btsal bar 'gro ba'i don dus rgyun chad
NK103(pe)009:547: med par rtag tu mdzad pa de yang //
NK103(pe)009:548: rang bzhin shugs 1kyi bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas 1phrad pa'i yul 1sems can gyi don 111rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)009:549: gong du bstan pa de ltar gzhan nas byung ba ma yin rang la lhun gyis rdzogs pa //
NK103(pe)009:550: rig pa rang gsal gyi ngang du skyed du byar
NK103(pe)009:551: med par mthar son pas re dogs dang bral ba'o
NK103(pe)009:552: // mtshan ma med pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs //
NK103(pe)009:553: mu matha'i phyogs ris dang bral ba'i skyes chen gyi
NK103(pe)009:554: 'bras bu rang la gnas par dmar thag chod pa'o
NK103(pe)009:555: // 'bras bu de yang thob nas der gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)009:556: rtogs pa mngon gyur gyi dus la nges pa med
NK103(pe)009:557: // // sngar lam stegs la sbyangs sam ma sbyangs
NK103(pe)009:558: par ye smin gyis lta ba rtogs pas 'bras bu
NK103(pe)009:559: mthar phyin te der gnas pa'am //
NK103(pe)009:560: rtogs pa tsam yod la de'i ngang du ma gnas
NK103(pe)009:561: kyang skye ba lan grangs 'ga' las bskal pa grangs
NK103(pe)009:563: rnam spyod dus la mi ltos 'bras bu nges pa'i don du gnas la //
NK103(pe)009:564: 'bras bu de gnas pa'i don la dang po thog ma med pa nas //
NK103(pe)009:565: tha ma nub pa med de dus gsum chig chod du grol pas so //
NK103(pe)009:566: sangs rgyas de yi thugs rje'i mdzad pa'i dus bstan pa yang //
NK103(pe)009:567: gdul bya skal ldan la rang gi ngo bos mi nub pa ni dper na nyi ma yi //
NK103(pe)009:568: snying po rang gsal ba des mun pa sel ba ltar du //
NK103(pe)009:569: thugs rjes don bya ba'i yul gyi las dang 'brel
NK103(pe)009:570: te byin rlabs kyi mdzad pa mi nub pa sna
NK103(pe)009:571: tshogs // cir yang shar nas don la dngos dang
NK103(pe)009:572: brgyud nas 'dren pa'i thabs su thams cad rdzogs la
NK103(pe)009:573: tshogs // // don mdzad pa phyogs gcig tu nges
NK103(pe)009:574: par 'dzin pa ni rang nyid bdud du 'gyur bas
NK103(pe)009:575: phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)009:576: shes sgrub kyi bcud 'dus pas snying po lhun gnas
NK103(pe)009:577: bde chen du ye nas gnas pa de rang nyams
NK103(pe)009:578: kyis bslad pa des 'khor bar 'khyams 0pa las //
NK103(pe)009:579: rmi lam rang snang ba'i thugs rjes lha dbang bskul
NK103(pe)009:580: bas lha'i dbang po'i thub pas gsung gi mnga' bdag
NK103(pe)009:582: rgyal ba kun gyis 'chad pa'i skyes bu rdo rje
NK103(pe)009:583: sems dpa' de bskul bas de las shar ba'i gsang
NK103(pe)009:584: sngags mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje 'chang chen po
NK103(pe)009:585: // de yis dga' rab bdag byin gyis brlabs dpag
NK103(pe)009:586: daka'i 'bras bu don shar nas thob par 'dod pa
NK103(pe)009:587: dang rang la gnas pas 'dod pa dang bral ba'i
NK103(pe)009:589: de 0bzhin 'bras bu rang la gnas pas tshul ngan
NK103(pe)009:590: rtsol bas thob pa min kyang thob 'dod thog pas
NK103(pe)009:591: bslad pas 'khyams pa las grol bar bya ba'i phyir
NK103(pe)009:592: // rang rtogs pa'i gdeng chen la gnas te phyogs
NK103(pe)009:593: su zhen pa'i mtha' kun las grol te nges par
NK103(pe)009:594: don la dmar thag kun gsal bar chod pa'i //
NK103(pe)009:595: snying po rnal ma'i don ston ma rig mun sel
NK103(pe)009:596: sgron ma 'di la skal ba dang ldan pa 'ga'
NK103(pe)009:597: gnas srid na yon tan mi zad pa'i gter du
NK103(pe)009:598: long la spyod // de ltar skal ba dang ldan
NK103(pe)009:599: pa min na brgyud nas rtogs pa'i lam stegs su
NK103(pe)009:600: tshul ngan gyi rtsol ba 'og ma pa gzhan yang
NK103(pe)009:601: spang ba min te rnal ma la shugs kyis 'jug
NK103(pe)009:602: long la spyod // pas so // a ti'i snod
NK103(pe)009:603: dang skal bar 'brel ba'i gang zag dag /'jig rten
NK103(pe)009:604: gyi khams na mang du med de 'ga' gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)009:605: long la spyod // pas so // // don du
NK103(pe)009:606: byang chub kyi snying po mtshon par byed pa'i thabs
NK103(pe)009:607: long la spyod // pas so // // su //
NK103(pe)009:608: man ngag 'di bzhag pas de la brten nas rang
NK103(pe)009:609: grol bar shog /'bras bu'i man ngag 'di dang phrad
NK103(pe)009:610: pa'i skal ldan dag /'di dang phrad 1bla ma mnyes
NK103(pe)009:612: grol nas bdud dgar ma btang bar le lo med par bsgrubs //
NK103(pe)009:613: bstan pa'i yang snying rang gi khong du nan tan gyis la sgrub shig par gdams pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:614: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i klong /
NK103(pe)009:615: slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje'i yang dag pa'i dgongs pa yang snying bzhag pa ste /
NK103(pe)009:617: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ba ta dang /
NK103(pe)009:618: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa
NK103(pe)009:619: nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing
NK103(pe)009:620: bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)009:622: bla ma yon tan rgyal mtshan dang //
NK103(pe)009:623: bla ma li ston gnyis la zhus //
NK103(pe)009:624: rang blos dpyad nas mchan bu btab //
